avoir conscience

  1. to be aware of (something), to be aware that …, to know that …
    Synonym: être conscient de/que

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Followed by a substantive introduced by the preposition de (avoir conscience de quelque chose), or by a subordinate clause introduced by the conjunction que (avoir conscience que …).

See also

[edit]
  • avoir connaissance
  • avoir bonne conscience
trans: to be aware of , to be aware that …, to know that …
